```{r}
require(RJSONIO)

```


```{r}

processJsonData <- function(jsonData) {
  jsonData <- lapply(jsonData, function(x) {
    #x[sapply(x, is.null)] <- NA
    unlist(x)
  })
  do.call("rbind", jsonData)
} 

```

BUSINESS:
```{r}
bus_ls <- fromJSON("yelp_academic_dataset_business.json")
str(bus_ls)
bus_df <- processJsonData(bus_ls)
str(bus_df)
```

Checkin:
```{r}
chk_ls <- fromJSON("yelp_academic_dataset_checkin.json")
str(chk_ls)
```
